flawed_nl_solution:
The clown is holding 3 x 12 = <<3*12=36>>36 balloons.
This many children buy a balloon: 3 + 12 = <<3+12=11>>11 kids.
After the children buy the balloons, the clown is holding this many in his hand 36 - 11 = <<36-11=25>>25 balloons.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
